#Calculate the mean, standard deviation, min and max of mpg as a function of cyl
mtcars |>
  group_by(cyl) |>
  summarize(avg = mean(mpg),
            std = sd(mpg),
            mn = min(mpg),
            mx = max(mpg))

Error in summarize(group_by(mtcars, cyl), avg = mean(mpg), std = sd(mpg),  :
